kep.selector package¶

Submodules¶

kep.selector.end_user module¶

Functions to slices of full monthly, quarterly and annual dataframes (dfm, dfa, dfq). These are end-user API functions.

Main function to produce selections of dataframes

kep.selector.var_names module¶

Generate variable list. Entry point: dump_var_list_explained() writes output/varnames.md

kep.selector.var_names.dump_var_list_explained()[source]¶

Writes table of variables (label, desciption, unit) to src/output/varnames.md

kep.selector.var_names.get_max_widths(table)[source]¶

Returns a list of maximum lenghts of variable names, text descriptions and unit of measurements.

kep.selector.var_names.test_pure_tabulate()[source]¶

Module contents¶

Parse and import Rosstat KEP publication to local database and query database to get time series from it.

1. Converter doc - > raw csv (word.py) 2. Parser raw csv + specification -> labelled csv -> flat stream -> database

(load_spec.py) (label_csv.py) (stream.py) (database.py)

3. Selector database -> dfm, dfq, dfa -> get_ts(), get_df()

... -> get_varnames()

(query.py)

  1. Converter Convert several MS Word files containing (a bit chaotic) tables to raw CSV file Files: word.py

  2. Parser Attach labels to rows in raw CSV file, flatten data and import it to database Files:

    label_csv.py, load_spec.py, stream.py common.py, database.py csv2db.py (control file)

  3. Selector Query database for pandas TimeSeries or DataFrame. Files: query.py

  4. Plotting Files: plots.py

  5. Testing Files: hardcoded.py, test_1.py

  6. Current work Files: temp.py
